author: Caitlin O'Kane
title: Colorado governor's emotional response to Nazi comparison
description: "As a Jewish American who lost family in the Holocaust, I'm offended by any comparison to Nazism," Governor Jared Polis said, getting visibly choked up.
content: Colorado Governor Jared Polis had a powerful response when he was asked about a Republican leader's comparison of stay-at-home orders to Nazism. During a press briefing Wednesday, a reporter asked Polis, who is Jewish, about criticism toward the stay-at-home … [+3187 chars]
